New Records: Shubman Gill became the fifth Indian to have scored hundreds in all three international formats
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill scored 126* off 72 balls including 1x4 and 3x6
Umran Malik took 2 wickets for 9 runs
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 16 runs
Daryl Mitchell scored 35 off 25 balls including 1x4 and 3x6
Pre-Game Insights: India decided to bat first due to the ball moving around more in the night
Hardik Pandya used his experience of the IPL final to decide to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: India maintained their unbeaten series record in all formats at home since March 2019
The powerplay symphony worked perfectly for India
Shubman Gill's innings was crucial for India's victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's margin of victory was the biggest in any T20I involving two Full-Member teams
The come-from-behind series win was significant for India
